name: Chainsaw Fish
description:
THE FISHING SEASON IS OPEN

THE GREEDY FISHERMEN DO EVIL DEEDS AGAIN

THIS TIME THEY'VE BROUGHT SNACKS TO LURE OUT LITTLE NAIVE FISHLINGS

THERE'S NO WAY TO GET A KID FISH OFF A SNACKY SNACK

BUT DON'T WORRY

CHAINSAW FISH

WILL CUT THE LINES!!!!!



CONTROLS:

SPACE – boost

LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW – turn

MOUSE – click menu buttons




CREDITS:

Made by LOWPOLIS ( @LOWPOLIS )

Graphics by @rayzones

Music by Yaffle ( @yafffle )
